#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include <cstring>
using namespace std;
vector<int> a[10001];
int visited[10001];

int dfs(int x, int n){
	if(x==n) return 1;
	if(visited[x]==-1){
		int res=0;
		for(int i=0; i<a[x].size(); i++){
				res+=dfs(a[x][i],n);
        }

		visited[x]=res;
	}
    return visited[x];
}

int main(){
    int n;
	cin>>n;
    memset(visited,-1,sizeof(visited));
	int x,y;cin>>x>>y;
	while(x!=0 && y!=0){
		a[x].push_back(y);
        cin>>x>>y;
	}
    int m=dfs(1,n);
    cout<<m;
    return 0;
}
